name: Baby cot
description:
Client is a single mother to 3 children. She is currently unemployed due to high caregiving needs of her child with ADHD and discomfort experienced due to her pregnancy. She requires an adjustable baby cot with side bed and wheels that can fit into her 2 room rental flat. 

More details can be provided.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Hannah Lim

passiton.name: Baby Cot
passiton.description: Isa Uchi Easy Cot, used for 11mths, super good condition almost as good as new. No bite marks. Paint slightly chipped off where we screwed to lower the cot.

name: Diapers
description:
Hi, there is a household of 6 who requires diapers for 2 of their young children. Husband is certified temporarily unfit for work as he is required to be the main caregiver for his wife and children. Wife was a victim of a scam which led to huge financial losses. With their lack of income and financial strain, they would require diaper support for the children. Here are the diaper details: Diapers Type 1
Brand: Merries
Size: XL
Type: Pants, 

Diapers Type 2
Brand: Merries 
Size: XXL 
Type: Pants

Thank you.

name: Diapers
description: Client is a full-time caregiver to her two young children. The family is living in a rental flat, with the husband being the sole breadwinner. Client will require assistance in getting diapers (Size M and XL - 2 packets each).

name: Bicycle
description:
Client is currently residing in a HDB 1-room rental flat. Client suffered a vertigo attack in 2022 and continues to experience nausea and frequent dizzy spells. 

Client has been deterred from securing gainful, full-time employment in view of her poor health status as she is unable to stand for long hours. Despite her challenges, client has consistently demonstrated resilience and determination to achieve self-sufficiency, as evident in her active efforts to take on ad-hoc employment opportunities despite her poor health status. 

Client hopes to have a bicycle to allow her to explore other types of employment such as Food Delivery Personnel, which may be more suited for her health condition.

contact.org: Viriya Community Services - Whispering Hearts Family Service Centre
contact.name: Lim Dong Qin

passiton.name: Kids Bicycle
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Bicycle
description: Family of 3 faces financial difficulties. They request for a children's bicycle for their 8-year-old son who is diagnosed with autism.

passiton.name: Kids Bicycle
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Vacuum cleaner
description: Siti Suhaidah is a 35-year-old mother to a 5-year-old son, Shufi. Her husband, Najib (M/26) is a Malaysian citizen and has returned to Malaysia to care for his sickly mother. Recently, he shuttled between Singapore and Malaysia and is currently looking for employment in Singapore. Siti Suhaidah is unemployed and is currently receiving SSO Comcare assistance. However, the fund has depleted as Shufi has been shuttling in and out of the hospital due to high fever. Siti Suhaidah had to use Comcare funds to make payments for hospital bills, medication, and transportation fees, in addition to groceries and meals. As a result, Siti Suhaidah does not have sufficient money to purchase a new vacuum cleaner to replace the old one which has spoilt.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Kreta Ayer
contact.name: Khairunnisa Nasir

name: Vacuum cleaner
description: Single mother with 6 children and 1 newborn grandson needs assistance to purchase a new vacuum cleaner. Their current vacuum cleaner is faulty. They would prefer a 2-in-1 wet and dry vacuum cleaner if possible.

name: TV
description: Retiree seniors hopes to replace their current TV in the living room as it is faulty. Wishes for smart TV as couple listens to songs on Youtube. Kindly email: travislee@kkcs.org.sg

passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

passiton.description: This is a great piece of furniture for a schoolchild or simple home office. One drawer has a slightly loose bottom panel but it can all be fixed with some glue. I have been using this personally. Giving it up because moving to a small flat.

name: Geriatric Chair
description: Elderly client who is diagnosed with stroke requires geriatric chair for sleeping/sitting. Current geriatric chair has malfunction and he does not have the financial means to repair it. Client looking for a working condition which allows to recline.

contact.name: Muhammad Azfar Bin Nazri

passiton.description: item was being use less than 3 months. Wish to donate out to the less fortunate people who needs it more. Thank you

name: Geriatric Chair
description:
Elderly advance-stage cancer patient with multiple co-morbidities is in need of replacement geriatric chair as current chair has faulty wheel-locks and worn out due to daily use and wear and tear.

Family is in need as son is the only breadwinner.
specifications: Manual Mobile Recliner Geriatric Chair with Tray

passiton.name: Geriatric chair
passiton.description: item was being use less than 3 months. Wish to donate out to the less fortunate people who needs it more. Thank you

name: Oxygen Concentrator
description:
74-year-old elderly lady has late-stage cancer. She requires an oxygen concentrator to help with breathlessness. Family has financial difficulties and is unable to afford the cost of renting or buying one. Looking for a donor who has a secondhand one in good condition. 

Pls contact me at 97274215 via Whatsapp. Thank you.

passiton.name: Oxygen Concentrator
passiton.description: It's an working Oxygen Concentrator used for people whom has difficulty in breathing and has been advised by doctor to use the machine for relax breathing.New tubes available too

name: Commode
description: Single mother staying in Woodlands rental flat with multiple health conditions (kidney disease stage 5, diabetes, high BP, high cholesterol) is in need of a commode. She is on kidney dialysis 3x/week. The family is relying on financial assistance for their daily needs.

passiton.name: Commode x 1 item (Black)
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

passiton.name: Commode Chair
passiton.description:
